attributes.action: Wish for driving charges to be brought in nationwide within a decade and for a license to be needed for a 4x4 or similer to be driven in our towns and cities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We Want the government to introduce a radical charge for drivers who are ruining the enviroment for ourselves and future generations. They should understand that if they are going to cause erepuable damage then they should have to pay dearly for it so we can try and fix the problems they create.
